snippet.title: Project Songbird | Official Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
Project Songbird is the 6th video game by Conner Rush and FYRE Games.  It has been developed primarily as a solo passion project over roughly the past 2 years.  

Step into the thick foliage and fog of the Appalachian forest as a musician desperate to break through their writers block and record their new album.  The woods are dark, but they are not vacant in this cinematic, narrative, psychological horror experience from the developer of Summerland and We Never Left.

Hi!  This is Conner, and I just wanna say thank you for everyone who's supported the development of this game!  I'm really excited to hear from you guys, and I'm happy to answer whatever questions you have.  See y'all again soon :)

Website: https://www.fyregames.com/
Studio Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/fyregames
Studio Itch Page: https://fyre-games.itch.io/
X: https://twitter.com/FyreGamesReal?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fyre_games/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@treasureman?_t=8ktFcwEXH1H&_r=1
